page.title: 16CHILDREN'S CLUBS
page.content: Brownies is a club for girls not yet old enough for guides and there is also a cub pack for boys of a similar age.Sharks is a club for children who can swim at least fifty metres which is held at the Jubilee Park swimming pool. Girl's Club is for girls of any age and is held at the Methodist Chapel. Choir practice is also available for those keen on singing,and a dancing class is held in the Coronation Hall. There are football clubs available in the village and at school,where many activity clubs are held through the year.There are clubs for children available most evenings of the week in Woodhall Spa and at a cost which most children can afford with their own pocket money.
